sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO mk_custgroup_trac ( cust_group_id, cust_group_name, cust_group_desc, cust_num, cust_type, start_date, end_date, status_code, oper_no, oper_name, oper_time, region_code, choice_code, out_custgroup_id, out_system_type, trac_id, update_type, update_no, update_name, update_time ) VALUES ( #custGroupId# , #custGroupName# , #custGroupDesc# , #custNum# , #custType# , #startDate# , #endDate# , #statusCode# , #operNo# , #operName# , #operTime# , #regionCode# , #choiceCode# , #outCustgroupId# , #outSystemType# , #tracId# , #updateType# , #updateNo# , #updateName# , #updateTime# )
